page.title: 20Cowton's Strange Happenings
page.content: Several houses in the area are report- ed to have ghosts. Neville House in North Cowton is haunted by a little girl wearing a smock, who died with her three brothers during a diptheria epidemic in the 1890's. She has been sighted twice in the last 15 years. Subsequently her parents had a second family, most of whom lived locally until the 1970's. The ghost of an old soldier, Frank Bainbridge, was seen recently in Fern Lea Cottage, N Cowton and a ghost has been seen at Temple House Farm, East Cowton. There is supposed to be a presence on the old road near Atley Hill. There have been reported sightings of U.F.O.'s in the area. Often these are low flying aircraft going to Teesside Airport, low flying R.A.F. jet fighters which regularly fly over, or flashes from Catterick army ranges.
